testcase.name: runScenario["Create user with missing name", "User API"](6)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Create user with missing name # src/test/resources/features/api/user_crud.feature:31 Given I use user test data "missingNameUser" # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.i_use_user_test_data(java.lang.String) When I send a POST request to "/users" Then Response code should be 400 # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.response_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer) And Response should have error message "Name is required" # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.response_should_have_error_message(java.lang.String) And Response header "Content-Type" should be "application/json" # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.response_header_should_be(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

testcase.system-out: Scenario: Create user with duplicate email # src/test/resources/features/api/user_crud.feature:113 Given I use user test data "duplicateEmailUser" # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.i_use_user_test_data(java.lang.String) When I send a POST request to "/users" Then Response code should be 409 # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.response_code_should_be(java.lang.Integer) And Response should have error message "User already exists" # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.response_should_have_error_message(java.lang.String) And Response header "Content-Type" should be "application/json" # stepdefs.api.UserApiSteps.response_header_should_be(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)
